description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating a new Event via a form, allowing users to input a title and select date/time, then save the event to a provider.

classes.name: EventFormPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that renders a form for creating a new event.

classes.name: _EventFormPageState
classes.description: State class for EventFormPage, managing form state, date/time picking, and saving the new event.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text editing controller.

methods.name: _pickDateTime
methods.description: Prompts the user to select a date and time, updating the state.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates the form, creates a new Event object, adds it to the provider, and navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the form page.
